#summary This page contains links and information about all of the current Java Codec downloads for RL-Glue.

*Notes:* To use this or any other codec, you must have RL-Glue Core installed first.

=== Available Downloads ===

 * [http://rl-glue-ext.googlecode.com/files/java-codec-2.0.tar.gz Java User Distribution 2.0] [http://code.google.com/p/rl-glue-ext/downloads/detail?name=java-codec-2.0.tar.gz (File Details)]
 * [http://rl-glue-ext.googlecode.com/files/java-codec-dev-2.0.tar.gz Java Developer Distribution 2.0] [http://code.google.com/p/rl-glue-ext/downloads/detail?name=java-codec-dev-2.0.tar.gz (File Details)]

=== User Quick Install ===
{{{
#Unpack the files
>$ tar -zxf java-codec-2.0.tar.gz

#Change to unpacked directory
>$ cd /path/to/java-codec-2.0

#Install the Codec
>$ java -jar JavaRLGlueCodec.jar --install
}}}
